body.name: Canon PIXMA 3522 Series All-in-One Color Inkjet Printer I Print Copy Scan I Mobile Printing I Wireless I 1.5" Segment LCD I 50 Sheets Paper Tray I 4800 x 1200 dpi I Black + Printer Cable
body.stockDetail: Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
features: 【Print Speed】Black: ESAT Approx. 7.7 ipm, Color: ESAT Approx. 4.0 ipm
【Paper Handling Input】50 Sheets of Plain Paper OR 20 Sheets (4 x 6)
【Connectivity】Wireless, USB Connection, Accessory Including a Printer Cable
body.description: PRODUCT OVERVIEW: KEY SPECIFICATIONS: Printer Type: All-in-One Inkjet Printer (Print, Copy, Scan) Printer Series: Canon PIXMA 3522 Series Connectivity Technology: Wireless, Hi-Speed USB Print Speed: Black: ESAT Approx. 7.7 ipm, Color: ESAT Approx. 4.0 ipm Print ResolutionUp to 4800 x 1200 dpi Print media: Plain Paper; Glossy: Photo Paper Plus Glossy II, Photo Paper Glossy; Magnetic Photo Paper, Restickable Photo Paper, Recycled paper and Chlorine-free paper can be used Paper Size: 4 x 6, 5 x 5 (Square), 5 x 7, Letter (8.5 x 11), Legal (8.5 x 14) Paper Handling(INPUT): Rear Paper Tray: 50 Sheets of Plain Paper OR 20 Sheets (4 x 6) INK TYPE: PG-275 Pigment Black Inks, CL-276 Dye Color Inks INK TANK & FILL VOLUME: PG-275 Black: 5.6 ml (Std.) | 11.9 ml (XL), CL-276 Color: 6.2 ml (Std.) | 12.6 ml (XL) Display: 1.5" Segment LCD Display Additional Information: Dimensions: 17.2" x 12.9" x 5.8" Approximate Weight: 8.7 lbs Accessory: Printer Cable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to set up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Prints every time
reviews.reviewText: Threw my 18 month old HP away- rarely printed after 4 months and I had to delete and reinstall their app with every use. This Cannon is great. Easy setup, easy connection to my WIFY. Prints each and every time. Totally pleased!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars easy set-up, but stock up on ink cartridges!
reviews.reviewText: It is a nice simple scanner/copier/printer, just what I needed, and the price can't be beat. You will be making up for that in ink costs, however, so if you will be doing high-volume printing, this is not the printer for you. The quality of the printed product is great. Very east to set up, convenient size, very lightweight. Overall I am happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Used ink in 20 pages, used new cartridge in 20 more.
reviews.reviewText: Never been more disappointed and mad about a purchase before! Gobbles up the ink and now won't pass the paper thru to print!! No paper jam that I can see. Just poor construction.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Remember to put printer ink in all the way lol
reviews.reviewText: I love that I can print from my phone.What I don’t like about it is the printing ink is so expensive

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2022
reviews.reviewText: First off, it will only print a photo as large as 5x7". Second, it continually becomes disconnected from the network so I have to repeatedly reconnect it with canon connection software. I'm not sure this is the printers fault but our last printer never had this problem. Lastly, if you are doing 2 sided printing, you have to grab the printed front sides of the pages and manually turn them over so the second side could print. Again, our last printer handled this automatically.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works perfectly with 5G
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a lightweight inexpensive printer to use while traveling in my camper van. It DOES feel fragile - which I expected for a $50 purchase at Wally World. I bought a cable because I anticipated that WiFi setup would be iffy. Setup was easy and intuitive. WiFi worked perfectly at first attempt (by following the included instructions and downloading the appropriate software). Not only did it work with my HP Pavillion right off the bat, but it also worked perfectly with my Samsung A53 phone. I've been using it for a week now, have never plugged in the cord. When the sample ink cartridges ran out, replacement was simple and intuitive, and the printer fired right back up without having to clear errors or go through other annoyances. I am delighted with this purchase. I will protect it from bumps and be gentle when manipulating parts. Well done you, Canon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Beware of this purchase
reviews.reviewText: When purchasing this item, I thought, how handy that Amazon would suggest to purchase additional ink. The ink they suggested will not work. So basically I spent $25 on ink that I have to throw in the trash. Shame on you Amazon. Now I have to search locally for ink. I so disappointed.
